protocol.text: The data were analyzed using the affy package in the R environment and expression values were normalized by the GC-RMA method with the gcrma package. ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 GC-RMA normalized signal intensity
Plants were shifted from 28 degrees C to 19 degrees C for 8h before collecting and freezing the samples. T0 samples were not shifted.
Plants were grown for 3.5 weeks at 28 degrees C
Total RNA were extracted using the Qiagen Rneasy kit, according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to a standard Ambion protocol from 1 μg total RNA (MessageAmp II-Biotin Enhanced Kit; Ambion).

After amplification and fragmentation, 12.5 μg of cRNA was hybridized for 16 h at 45 degrees Con GeneChip ATH1-121501 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained with Fluidics Script FS450-004 in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
protocol.type: nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol

protocol.text: Chips were scanned using a GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G
